Package de.hshannover.dqgui.dbsupport.gui

Class AbstractEngineUpdateCreate

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshannover.dqgui.dbsupport.gui.AbstractEngineUpdateCreate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EngineFallback, JDBCCommon, MongoDbGui
    public abstract class AbstractEngineUpdateCreate
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that allows to implement update/create operations for database connections within the GUI.
